sentence.Network_en: It is a sensuous but demanding car to drive.
sentence.Network_cn: 这车坐上去很舒服，但需要高超的驾驶技术。

sentence.Network_en: He found the rigours of the tour too demanding.
sentence.Network_cn: 他发现这次旅行非常艰苦。

sentence.Network_en: The strikers are demanding higher pay and better working conditions.
sentence.Network_cn: 罢工者要求加薪并改善工作环境。

entry.tran: 费时的;费力的;劳神的;要求很高的
entry.def: A demanding job or task requires a lot of your time, energy, or attention.

example.ex: He found he could no longer cope with his demanding job...
example.tran: 他发现自己已无力应对那份劳神费力的工作了。

example.ex: It is a demanding role and she needs to work hard at it.
example.tran: 那是一个要求很高的角色，她必须要加倍努力。

entry.tran: 难伺候的;难取悦的;挑剔的;苛刻的
entry.def: People who are demanding are not easily satisfied or pleased.

example.ex: Ricky was a very demanding child...
example.tran: 里基是个非常难伺候的孩子。

example.ex: Her boss was very demanding but appreciative of Christina's talents.
example.tran: 克里斯蒂娜的老板非常苛刻，但同时也很欣赏她的才华。

means.word_mean: 1. requiring more than usually expected or thought due; especially great patience and effort and skill;

auth_sentence.content: They are demanding cooperation and they are demanding progress.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are demanding cooperation and they are demanding progress.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are demanding cooperation and they are demanding progress.

auth_sentence.content: Opposition parties are demanding the immediate restoration of parliament.
auth_sentence.res_content: Opposition parties are demanding the immediate restoration of parliament.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Opposition parties are demanding the immediate restoration of parliament.

auth_sentence.content: She is demanding reasonable child support, effective immediately.
auth_sentence.res_content: She is demanding reasonable child support, effective immediately.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She is demanding reasonable child support, effective immediately.

Sentence.sentence: He would rather get a less demanding job.
tackle the demanding biology and physics courses
Along with the new structure came a more demanding academic program, the percentage of freshmen taking biology jumped from 17 to 95.

Confronted with such facts,some Swedish activists and legislators are demanding more extreme and far-reaching measures, such as replacing male and female pronouns with a neutral alternative and monitoring children more closely to correct them when they gravitate(被吸引) toward gendered play.
The kidnappers had been demanding 1 million pounds for the release of Mr. Louis. Louis.

means.word_mean: 很费心的, 很费力的
